title: Summary - Tropical Storm Otis (EP3/EP182023)
author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary:
...OTIS NOW A TROPICAL STORM INLAND... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Wed Oct 25
 the center of Otis was located near 18.6, -100.7
 with movement NNW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 995 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
